ygData.subject: Re: Role Playing
ygData.msgSnippet: You just have to face it.. everybody wants everything today. Its just a representation of soceity and the culture we live in.  I myself look at them sometimes
ygData.messageBody:
You just have to face it.. everybody wants everything today. Its just a
representation of soceity and the culture we live in. I myself look at them
sometimes when i feel im stuck. The problem is though is.. during the game
people /ooc or /shout out for solutions and people are so quick to give them
the answer to any question. Unfortutely the answer is right there i cant
block it out I can remove it from my mind. I just wish that people would
try to keep some mystery to the game, and i know i can just filter out
Shouts and Out of Characters but... i shouldnt have to do that to enjoy the
game. Everyone just wants a hand out.. :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Shane Bole [mailto:shane0009@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 2:03 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Role Playing


From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>

this is pretty lame... this is an RPG, but on all the polls, people want
walkthroughs on quests? where is the fun in that? maybe a hint or 2, but its
no fun walking around following a guide telling you to avoid so and so
whatever to not get killed.
just wondering if anyone aggrees with this...
